website_summaries.verdict: The high-quality, no-sweat design ensures your desk stays free of condensation. Comes in three different sizes and various colors.
pros: Double-wall insulated construction keeps drinks at desired temperature for a long time
It's also dishwasher-safe, so no need to wash by hand
cons: Smooth surface can be slippery and lacks a handle for easy gripping

customer_reviews.title: Fake don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a counterfeit item. I feel bad for people giving this positive reviews because you are not using the quality of real Yeti. In my photos, the dark blue is a REAL Yeti cup. The Seafoam color which I purchased from this seller is not only a fake but a very bad one. The first giveaway was the packaging being cheap and damaged and also coming direct from China. Secondly the Yeti stamp on the side of the cup is washed out and faded. A REAL Yeti will have stainless engraved writing. The writing on your REAL Yeti will also match/line up exactly with the Yeti writing on the bottom of your cup.
customer_reviews.author: LuxuryLoverTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: The image pictured has a YETI lid. My tumbler did not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks and feels nice, and works as advertised in terms of keeping ...
customer_reviews.text: At the end of the day, yes, this costs more than some alternatives. But it is very high quality, looks and feels nice, and works as advertised in terms of keeping things plenty hot or cold. I would say the biggest benefit is if there is something really cold in it, the outside does not sweat or leave condensation rings on your table on hot days. UPDATE: After having this for a few months, I've burned my mouth on coffee more than once after OVER AN HOUR of it sitting in the tumbler. I've since learned my lesson - if you put something hot in here, it's staying hot. Consider yourself warned.
customer_reviews.author: the eliminator

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Stay Warm - Top Leaks & Spills - I Recommend Another Brand
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this mug. Have been using the Contigo AUTOSEAL West Loop Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Travel Mug with Easy Clean Lid, When the color started peeling off the stainless, I decided to try the Yeti brand. I ended up donating this Yeti one . It only kept my drink warm for a short period of time, and the part I disliked the most was the lid just suctions on and it has an open drink spout which can leads to spills. For the price I was expecting much better. So I have re-ordered the Contigo mug,
customer_reviews.author: PinkDemonTriGirl

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Counterfeit items!!! These are not authentic Yeti products!!! Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: ryan sigler

customer_reviews.title: Ugh
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this pretty cup. Although it's beautiful and it does keep my water cold, the ice does not even last 4 hours. I think it has to do with the plastic. I have a solid stainless steel Yeti and it works PERFECTLY like advertised. My ice in the stainless steel one keeps ice cold for DAYS. This one was a waste of money although I use it because I don't want to waste my money.
customer_reviews.author: hewlew

customer_reviews.title: Worst Yeti I have Purchased, If Even Real
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two other Yeti cups in the precious years from walk-in stores. I was very displeased this one, especially after reading many of these comments. The lid on the Yeti I ordered here does not stay on! It has fallen straight off! It also has some type of metal piece moving in the bottom of it, because when I am walking with it, it sounds like I am shaking a cowbell. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor S.

customer_reviews.title: If you dont have one, get one
customer_reviews.text: If you're on the fence...jump. These things do not disappoint! I use all year long, daily. Keeps my iced tea iced and my hot tea HOT! no joke on a 100 degree day I can drive around, run errands get back into my car and always count on a cold sip waiting for me. I have several sizes and use both. 20 oz for coffee - larger for my teas. Also, purchased the straw lid for my chilled bev's. Love that there's no condensation when used for cold stuff. Would love to buy their cooler but would have to sell my kidney first...pricey..
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C.

customer_reviews.title: These things keep the temperature warm for HOURS
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months not, and I'm still surprised to find that tea I poured 8 hours earlier is still warm when I pick it up and drink. I am always drinking something, but very very slowly....so the mug is perfect for me since it keeps the temperature regulated way longer than a regular mug or thermos. The only issue is that if I pour in boiling water it'll still be boiling 4 hours later and I'll burn my tounge on it because I keep forgetting. But that's a human error issue haha.
customer_reviews.author: Sneha

customer_reviews.title: Great tumbler. It does NOT fit in cup holders ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tumbler. It does NOT fit fully in cup holders in a 2000 Durango nor a 2001 Explorer. Should be sold with the removable handle. A person on a budget might be better off finding a suitable less pricey substitute. Cold retention has not been tested, but for the morning coffee, this tumbler will retain heat. Yeti needs to design an opening for the lid that can be closed and make the the lid seal-able. This will also aid it retaining the heat of the mornings first cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: LHFX1

customer_reviews.title: Vent hole isn't drilled. No warranty.
customer_reviews.text: The cup showed up on time. unfortunately it wasn't as described, there was no vent hole drilled in the lid, it looks like the bit broke during drilling or something.I contacted YETI and they told me the "warranty" is void because I didn't buy it through an authorized dealer. I contacted the seller and though it took them over a week to get back to me, but they did send me a new cup. The cup performed very well, it held ice water at room temp for 26 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical purchasing this because of all the reviews saying it was fake but the Yeti Rambler and kid I received are definitely real. It came with the same informational cards and stickers I received when ordering my other Yetis from the official website. The color is as pictured as well. On the right is the Yeti I ordered from Amazon and the left is from the official Yeti website (straws not included in purchase) They keep drinks cold all day, definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am sure that the ones that I received are fake.
customer_reviews.text: After comparing with my other Yeti gear, and watching the videos comparing real and fake Yeti cups, I feel certain that the ones I got on Amazon are fake. The lids have a bluish tint, and the lgos one the side and bottom do not line up. I looked at four others that I got at Yeti authorized dealers and the lids are clear and the logos line up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Pete On Tour

customer_reviews.title: ... received one as a gift 2 years ago and love it! I use it everyday for either cold ...
customer_reviews.text: I received one as a gift 2 years ago and love it! I use it everyday for either cold or hot drinks. Ice remains for a long time even when left in a hot car. If you put a hot drink in it make sure it is the temperature you like to drink because it will remain very hot especially with the lid on. If you leave the lid off it will cool faster. Keeps my coffee or tea hot for a long time. Works best with the lid on for insulation. I just purchased two more as gifts. Everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.author: dduryea

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit...that works.
customer_reviews.text: Mine was definitely counterfeit. However I tested it alongside a legit Yeti, and an RTIC, with exactly equal weights of ice and water, for 4 hours outside in 90 plus degree heat. Both the real and the fake Yeti and the RTIC had exactly the same ice melt, 8.5%. You get exactly the same performance for exactly the same price from the real and fake Yeti. And exactly the same performance from the less expensive RTIC. So, if you want Yeti performance, and you perchance get a counterfeit one, you’ll at least get the performance you paid for. I’m not returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Guerra

customer_reviews.title: I like to use if for cold drinks because the ice ...
customer_reviews.text: This keeps drinks cold and hot for long periods of time. I purchased the lid and straw to use for mostly cold drinks but it also works for hot. There is ice in the rambler the next morning. I like to use if for cold drinks because the ice doesn't melt as quickly and water my drinks down. The color on the outside is very durable and doesn't ship or wear off. It isn't cold or hot to touch on the outside. I'm in love with these YETI Ramblers and tumblers. I will never purchase any other brand and nor should I have to. These will last for a long time due to quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTIE CAMPBELL

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price tag!!!!
customer_reviews.text: You are pretty much paying for a name with this thing. There are much much cheaper products that maintain the temperature of your drink just as good or better than a Yeti. In fact, a cold drink is the only thing I found this to be efficient at maintaining temperature. I'll make a k-cup in the morning and pour it into this immediately but within the 20 minute drive to work....it's only slightly warm. I'll buy an Artic or another brand for half the price if I'm only getting 30 minutes to drink my coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Heather and Doug

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if they came with the slider lid instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an insane coffee cup... everything youve heard is true of Yeti. My bubba cup (which i thought was boss) only kept my coffee hot from 7:20 am till about 10:00 am.. this yeti mug is far too hot to drink out of without adding ice. But with one ice cube in it this thing stays hot from 7:20 am till 1:30 pm. And its still on the hot side of warm. Would be nice if they came with the slider lid instead of buying it seperate. 4 stars because it works too well, youll burn your mouth for a week till you get used to how to use it
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great product an worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: If your a coffee drinker or don't like straw's the lid that comes with this is perfect. I ordered a lid an silicone straws for or two Yeti's. They keep your ice an beverage so cold. They are on the heavy side however they make handles for the yeti an they work great. I haven't bought on yet but that my next purchase. My friend had the handle on hers an loves it
customer_reviews.author: Todd Rosenkrans

customer_reviews.title: Good but can be better with improved lid
customer_reviews.text: Use daily to carry juice to work. Bought airtight lid after reading reviews. Yeti has to improve its lids people should not need to buy separately for the price they charge for this tumbler
customer_reviews.author: APPS

customer_reviews.title: NOT Stainless Steel on the Inside
customer_reviews.text: 1) Serial number on the bottom matches the photo in the reviews described as "counterfeit" (compare photos). 2) Inside is painted or anodized metal in silver color, it is NOT stainless steel ! However, the outside is stainless steel, but I expect the inside to be stainless because it is the inside that reacts with the liquid we put into it. This is difficult if not impossible to see in photos; this has been quite a learning experience! Hence, I am returning this and buying a cup with stainless on the inside. Many other tumblers/mugs/cups are in fact stainless steel on the inside and YETI should be more clear & honest about their description.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia C.

customer_reviews.title: Yeti tumbler rocks!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Yeti tumbler is awesome!!! It keeps iced drinks cold for hours, is well made, easy to drink from, and is well worth the money!!! There is an optional top with a straw hole and you can order a nice sturdy handle for this beautiful tumbler. Not cheap, but if you want top notch quality, this Yeti tumbler will not disappoint!!! Worth every penny!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim M

customer_reviews.title: Great cup!
customer_reviews.text: I keep water by my bed every night and I was tired of waking up to take a drink and all the ice would have melted and it was warm. I saw that amazon had a flash sale and I thought it can't hurt so I bought one. I filled my cup with ice water at about 11:00pm and it still has ice at 10:00am the next morning. Best cup I have ever had! I've been reading about knockoffs and if this is a knockoff it came in the nicest packaging I've ever seen and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: T&C

customer_reviews.title: Dribbles out. Not vacuum-sealed.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my Yeti for about three months now. I have three friends that have the same one and rave about it (bought elsewhere). It does keep my beverage cold but the drink always dribbles on me to the point where I need to use a straw. Even if I pour my drink and am extra careful to dry the lip of the Yeti and the lid, it still dribbles. My friends say theirs do not do this so maybe mine is defective. Definitely not a vacuum-sealed top. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: OrlandoPaula

customer_reviews.title: BEST CUP SOLD BY PRONGHORN
customer_reviews.text: I use mine everyday. I am a school bus driver and there is no a/c on my bus. My drink stays ice cold and the ice barely melts. The temperature on the bus can get to 100 degrees and above in the summer. I would highly recommend this or any YETI product but ONLY purchase through PRONGHORN. PRONGHORN IS THE ONLY AUTHORIZED SELLER OF YETI ON AMAZON. I researched this and it is a fact.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Of Twin Cuties

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this tumbler!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase! Was spending way too much on iced coffee from Dunkin Donuts and decided to cut my bottom line by making my own iced coffee at home. So now I freeze some coffee as ice cubes and put them in the Yeti and add fresh hot homemade coffee to it. The ice melts and the Yeti keeps the coffee super cold for as long as it takes me to drink it. At least a few hours sometimes, and I'm sure it will stay cold for longer. I have the blue one and I love the look of it. Very solid construction. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Macro Mike

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep liquids cold.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dented. It was just put in a envelope and mailed. No packing around it at all. Sent it back. Received another one. Didn’t keep ice filled to the top in my air conditioned house from melting within 2 hours. I thought if I paid a lot it would be a great/good mug. Wrong. Ordered one for $9.00. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: PJD

customer_reviews.title: great product for any kind of beverage cold or hot
customer_reviews.text: I use this cup mostly to avoid plastic cups when having drinks with friends after the mtb rides, it doesn't matter if it's beer or vodka, my drinks keep cool the whole time...i have left ice in ti, inside the car overnight and the next day the ice is still there! I live in the caribbean we do not have other season than summer
customer_reviews.author: TOH70

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: This cup doesn't keep drinks cold any longer than a regular plastic thermos. And it doesn't even compare to my Hydroflask bottle which keeps ice cubes frozen for 24+ hours. This product is more expensive than it's worth.
customer_reviews.author: KMS

customer_reviews.title: Very well made! Buy it and buy a closing lid too.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing cup. Solidly made. Purchased as Christmas gift for hubby. Big cup, but fits in the cup holder in the car. Keeps true to it's word. Keeps cold things cold and hot things hot. Will pour some ice water for night time drinking and wake up to ice still in the water in the morning. Dishwasher safe. Wish it came with a closing lid, need to purchase one separately as my hubby has spilled it on himself a couple of times on the go. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup. When it arrived I noticed a tiny blemish and thought nothing of it. Now after the first trip through the dishwasher it seems to have moisture under the coating and a white patch about 1 inch long, with water spotting on the other side. Very disappointed with the quality. Also based on the description I did not realize it doesn't come with the magslider lid. I spoke with Amazon's customer service and they offered to replace the mug; however, it is no longer available so I opted for a partial discount instead. Guess I'll put a cute sticker over the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color came off within a week and became partly grey?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve read all of the reviews for yetis and it says you can use in the dishwasher. I’ve only put this in the dishwasher a few times on the top and most of the Black has come off leaving the cup with a black and grey effect that definitely looks unintentional! I didn’t have time to return it so I guess we’re stuck with it. It still works for its primary function of keeping drinks cold and warm though so at least that’s a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Powell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Purchase!  Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I will NEVER buy another cup again. I put ice in this at 7 am before work and when I come home at 5:30 pm, there are still chunks of ice left. You get what you pay for and this cup is with every stinkin' penny. I put it on the top rack of my dishwasher and it washes beautifully and it still looks brand new. I haven't tried anything hot in it because the hole on the top doesn't seal. You can fit any size plastic straw in this (I've used regular sized and milkshake size) cup as long as you can pinch it to get it in the slot.
customer_reviews.author: Denarella

customer_reviews.title: What I was always looking for
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I’ve been looking for a coffee container like this for years. I’ve tried quite a few, even from a big coffee retail chain. But those didn’t quite do it for me - quality, durability, feel not up to par. But this rambler is fantastic. This over engineered (in a good way!) product looks a feels fantastic and keeps coffee hot for a long time. I actually received my first one as a gift. I loved it so much I bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Slam

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My husband has had other brand tumblers in a similar style to this one and has dented, damaged, completely broken, lost, more of these than I can count. He's had this one for over a year and he uses it daily. The cup looks like new (and he hasn't dropped it any less than prior ones) and it keeps everything cool. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my iced coffee every morning
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my iced coffee every morning, and the color is so cute! It really does keep your drinks hot/cold way longer than the average insulated travel mug. Although the lid itself secures firmly to the cup with a silicone gasket, I wish there was a lid with a more secure closure for sipping. I might try the mag-slider, but the reviews I've read don't sound too promising. For now, I use the straw lid and am happy with that for my cold beverages.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Cool Tumblers
customer_reviews.text: These are actually the second set of they Yeti Ramblers I've bought. We bought the first set for the lake and like them so much we got a set for home too. They keep your drink cold for a long time so I actually finish a drink before the ice is melted. I love having the lid so my drink doesn't splash out while i'm walking. It is easy to drink out of too.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie glendenning

customer_reviews.title: FAKE YETI
customer_reviews.text: This was a fake. I got a 20 oz tumbler and comparing it to a real one, the fake one was slighly taller, a pinch lighter, the yeti logo on the bottom of the cup doesn’t align with the yet logo on the side of the bottle, the coloring and graphics on the label were off and a little blurry, and the color of the instructions and materials that came in the bottle were a little bit off and not as high of quality, nor were they even creased. These are fake like everyone else says. It is an incredibley good fake, but still a fake. Wet disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: They really do work.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really buy into Yeti at first. After receiving the tumbler size as a gift I'm hooked. They really do keep stuff hot for a long time. I frequently make coffee, set it on my desk, and then proceed to forget it's there. When I remember I have coffee in front of me 3-4 hours later it's still really hot.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Old lid ...NOT the magslider
customer_reviews.text: The Yeti itself is nice... and I've ordered this tumbler many times, to glitter them. Never an issue. THIS time however, I paid full price $34.99 plus tax and was sent a Yeti with an old lid, it didnt have the authentic sticker on the bottom either. Super disappointed, if you're charging full price, I dont see why I'd get the old less effective lid. Waste of time, will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great cup and worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.text: This tumbler is everything you've heard it is. Very sturdy, great looking and keeps cold beverages cold or hot beverages hot for hours. I use my 20 oz for coffee during the day and the 30 oz for water or other beverage into the evening. I take ice water to bed every night and with this cup there's still ice in the morning when I get up. Great product and yes, worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: GAB1500

customer_reviews.title: Legit Rambler from Pronghorn Outfitters
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Tahoe Blue 30 oz from Pronghorn Outfitters and ran it through every Feti test I could find. Passed all with flying colors. Took it to work the next day and held ice all day just like my original cup. Only bummer is the cups on yeti.com come with the new sliding lid and these have the original lid. Which is fine for the 30 oz because I use straws with mine, but do drink hot liquids from the 20 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Lou A Kee

customer_reviews.title: Purely Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am a coffee cup junkie!!!! I hate them because they are too small, or they don't stay hot long enough, or they peel, or the top leaks, or it doesn't fit in the cup holder right... I can go on and on. Not this one! It is perfection! It fits in my Audi, stays hot, stays sturdy, I love the cap, doesn't spill.... purely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Robeeen

customer_reviews.title: Go with YETI - Cheaper Versions do not work nearly as well.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my Ice Tea Cold in the Summer, and my Coffee Hot in the Winter . . . But how do it know? This mug is magic. Keeps the ice in your drink all day long, even when left in the car in the hot Florida summer. Simple physics makes this an remarkable mug for keeping beverages hot or cold. Worth the high price. Cheaper alternative simply do not perform as well as the YETI.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: This has become my daily rambler.
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 pairs of Hydro Flask ramblers, decided to try this new from YETI because of the disccounted price. I couldn't be happier; YETI quality is top notch. They're the king standart when it comes to Rambler/Tumbler industry. Everything they made it's quality.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Didn't think this would be as good as it really is
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think this would be as good as it really is. Had a drink, the next morning there was still ice in the cup. It's actually the best cup for drinking margaritas in because they never melt! I love mine so much I bought my wife one too. otherwise she would just try and swipe mine all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott ledin

customer_reviews.title: Not like a regular Yeti
customer_reviews.text: Not like a regular Yeti. Hot stays hot about 2 hrs. Cold drinks, the ice melts w/in an hour. If you are in the market for a good travel mug that retains your drinks integrity, up grade to the sealed Yeti. The lid to this one allows far too much air flow, cooling hot liquids and melting ice, far too fast. We are returning it for a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Ellison

customer_reviews.title: her response was "This cup sucks, my coffee is already lukewarm
customer_reviews.text: If you're buying this as a coffee travel mug, save your money! I bought this for my wife for Christmas and when she opened the box her response was "Best Gift Ever!". The next day; 30 minutes after she filled it with hot coffee; her response was "This cup sucks, my coffee is already lukewarm!" The only thing keeping me from giving it 1-star is it seems to keep cold liquids cold.......She's reverting back to her $5.99 Mr. Coffee travel mug that keeps her coffee hot for hours. I guess I ended up buying her a $25 water cup.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Needs closeabil lid.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful cup keeps whatever cold or hot well. Only problem is if I tip it over the lid doesn't have a closure for the drink hole.
customer_reviews.author: ROGER O. DANLEY

customer_reviews.title: All Day Long!
customer_reviews.text: I had a few of these already and purchased this Yeti as a gift. I should be a spokesperson for Yeti because I am always like "OMG you have to have one of these, it keeps ice in the cup all day long!" Next time I see them, I see a Yeti in their hand! AHA! Love my Yeti. It is pricey, but sometimes quality comes with a price. I want to save up for a cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Guitarbythefire

customer_reviews.title: The prices - see below
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was strange that the smaller tumbler - 20 oz. - was $40 and the larger tumbler - 30 oz. - was $30. Usually the bigger one would be more expensive!
customer_reviews.author: E. Smart

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using this cup daily for a year and a half now. For a year of that we lived in Florida and even there, he still had ice in his cup when he got home! Definitely an awesome product! Just watch because if it is ever left sitting in the hot sun, the metal will get hot and burn you (I learned this the hard way!)
customer_reviews.author: Austyn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: This Yeti tumbler keeps drinks warm. Large enough to hold enough tea/coffee for the morning commute. Fits in my cupholders perfectly. Easy to clean design. We've purchased my travel mugs and tumblers over the years, but this one isn't a pain the clean. After a year, the rubber ring on the lid still fits snug.
customer_reviews.author: Young Wifey

customer_reviews.title: A Godsend for Mail Carriers.
customer_reviews.text: This is more than fantastic! My husband is a Rural Mail Carrier, and the un-air-conditioned vehicle he drives can reach temps of up to 140°. While the Post Office where he works provides ice, it always melts by half-way through his route. He heard about the Yeti and searched around town, but I found the best price on Amazon. He was so excited after using it the first day, because there was still ice in the Yeti when he returned to the P.O. Now he tells everyone he sees about it. I expect there'll be a big boost in sales once the word gets around the Post Office.
customer_reviews.author: Olwin

customer_reviews.title: Works great at first
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome mug. I got one as a gift and was amazed that ice cubes stayed frozen overnight. However, after 10-11 months it stopped keeping drinks cold or hot. I didn't put it in the dishwasher or do anything to make it stop working. I guess it was just designed to last only a short while in order to get repeat buyers. And it worked with me. I enjoyed it so much that I bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: TFW

customer_reviews.title: The water stays cool, but I like my water REALLY cold
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this! However, my ice melts fairly quickly in this container. My friend at work has one, and she puts ice in hers about 6:00AM, AND, still has lots of ice even after lunch. I am constantly adding ice throughout the day. The water stays cool, but I like my water REALLY cold. Not sure if I have a defective one, or what. My faux Yeti, I purchased at Walmart, worked better than this one...well, for a little over a year. I won't purchase another one at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Vogler

customer_reviews.title: I know others have said they checked, but I was sent a fake YETI rambler.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in January and actually just found out that it's a fake. I noticed my tea wasn't staying as hot for as long as it should and that's when I started to notice little things, like the YETI logo is a bit off centered and painted on instead of showing metal like on others this size as well as there isn't the correct amount of numbers in the serial ID on the bottom. It's still a good mug but definitely disappointed I spent money on a fake. I love the ease of Amazon but maybe use the actual YETI website for these purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the color - so far seems really solid
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this. Great color. Keeps my drink hot or cold. I wish I could close the spout as it fell over in my bag one day and, of course, it spilled because the drinking area is just open. But it does fit in my cup holder which I did not think would be possible because it seems quite large! I'm happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: Holds temperature very well
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning because item arrived several days later than the guaranteed delivery date, however it may have been because of the Christmas rush. We have two other Yeti cups and they hold hot and cold items very well. No sweating on the cup. You can’t microwave and I believe you can’t wash the cup in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie T

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I originally was gifted one of these from work, and my wife loved it so much we got a second mug. This is perfect for camping or long road-trips where you need your drink to stay cool or hot for a long period of time. I have had coffee still warm hours later, and ice still in my ice water the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: I use this everyday. It’s fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day to bring coffee to work. It keeps my coffee hot for hours! I’ve had cold beverages in the yeti and I believe this is it’s number area of expertise. The hot beverages do just fine, but I should be using a different lid for safety purposes. They’re cheap and easy enough to order though! I recommend this to anyone who is looking for a mug.
customer_reviews.author: James Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not keeping up to its name.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my YETI on March 8. This is my fourth YETI and was replacing one I accidentally left at an event. I live in the FL Keys and carrying water with you, is a must, especially when it's hot outside. I was super impressed with how cold it was keeping my beverages and how well the ice stayed. After having it just over two months, it doesn't keep my beverages cold, ice is melting and the cup is sweating! I am very disappointed in this cup and will only buy from an authorized dealer going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Schwab-Talpas

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping drinks cold even in the Florida heat!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift mpfor my husband, I was reluctant to spend the money on a stainless tumbler that was more than twice the amount of money other tumblers are selling for. I realize you are paying for the brand name,Yetti. He was so surprised how well cold drinks stay cold and for how well it will keep ice. So, much I had to buy myself one! We take these cups out on the boat, they sit in the sun all day and still have ice at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but this one was defective
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these and ordered a second one for my husband. The product is terrific for keeping drinks super hot for a long time and we both have been enjoying them, until today, when the plastic top in my husband's Yeti suddenly cracked. It looks like a spider web, but didn't fall apart. We both love the product, but this one must have been defective. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats a Yeti
customer_reviews.text: You will definitely want to invest in the handle for this cup. It's very bulky and difficult to hold. But it's incredible how long it can keep your drink hot or cold. I made ice tea for lunch and the tea still had ice the next morning when I came into work.
customer_reviews.author: Ferris Beashau

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping coffee Hot!!!
customer_reviews.text: As they say "You get what you pay for" this is a great mug and keeps my coffee hot for 2-3 hours if I haven't already drank it all. It's not a fake as some post have revealed. The Yeti emblem lines up on the side and bottom and the lid is solid clear and the "C" in China is capital...
customer_reviews.author: crobin1

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a Father's Day gift for my dad ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Father's Day gift for my dad and he said he loves it. It has kept his coffee so hot that he has burnt the ROOF of his mouth not once, but twice! So be careful! He uses it for cold drinks too and it works so well that he takes it everywhere with him. Now my husband wants one too!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with Yeti.
customer_reviews.text: Five star all the way; however, I did not get the sea foam color I ordered. Amazon substituted with the stainless one that I already had. I would not have ordered another stainless steel; however, just had surgery and not up to sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie Davison

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing tumbler
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a cup that kept my coffee hot for hours, which is what the cup had been said to do. But it doesn't do any better than my Starbuck's tumbler.I did a test and here are the results. I poured boiling water into both cups. Time Yeti temp Starbucks temp 1/2 hour 184 188 2 hours 152 158 3 1/2 hours 137 142 5 hours 123 127 6 hours 118 121 I did some research, and I think I did not get a fake Yeti, because of how the "E" is shaped. So this is a big disappointment to me!
customer_reviews.author: G. Trihus

customer_reviews.title: Really Really Works
customer_reviews.text: This tumbler comes with a clear lid (good for cleaning and checking volume). It fits my cup holder, stable and doesn't tend to tump over. The sip opening admits a small or large straw, which I use for Hot Yoga class, and disposable straws don't need to be cleaned (slightly less green but true). It does seem to keep drinks cold longer than my (many) other drink containers with the exception of HydroFlask reviewed on this site.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: This tumbler works better that I had expected.
customer_reviews.text: Most companies who sell insulated tumblers promise their product will keep your beverage hot or cold for hours. As a consumer, you buy the product only to find out that's not entirely true and your left with a cupboard full of tumblers. Do yourself a favor, toss them or donate them. This tumbler is worth the money. This DOES keep your beverage hot or cold. I drink a lot of water and this tumbler keeps cold ice water with ice cubes that last over 7 hours. I've used it for hot coffee and it stays hot. Well worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Berg

customer_reviews.title: If it is a fake it is a darn good one though
customer_reviews.text: I have a strong suspicion that the rambler I received is a fake. If it is a fake it is a darn good one though. The lid does have a slight blueish hue which according to my research indicates a fake. Also, the profile of the inside of the cup is also different from my known to be real rambler but this could just be a design change based on age.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: Only found two cons
customer_reviews.text: So there are only two cons to owning a yeti. First of all warm drinks will stay warm for hours and same with cold drinks, in means of that it's well worth the money. So on to the two cons: in the summer if you drink all your drink you'll have to chew on a ice cube because they won't melt. The second is in the winter if you put something hot in it don't expect to warm your hands on the outside of the mug. Buy one, everyone else has...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when the tumbler came. I’ve owned for just over 30 days, I use for hot tea. I’m very disappointed with how dull and dingy the tumbler appears from hand washing. The seal for the lid doesn’t fit well.. expensive and unhappy
customer_reviews.author: carla mannes

customer_reviews.title: Mix feelings
customer_reviews.text: I love that it keeps my water cold for up to 12 hours. However I have only had mine for 7 months and I 99% of the time I wash it by hand even though it says dishwasher safe but the black color is already way chipped off and it . That I am not to happy with. For the price you pay and after getting the lid with the straw idk if it was work it.
customer_reviews.author: Apen

customer_reviews.title: It also does a great job in the car during the extremely hot summer ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad, not really knowing if they are "all that". Well, they are. He fills it up in the morning, and doesn't need to add ice until almost dinner time. It also does a great job in the car during the extremely hot summer temps. It comes with a top, so don't make the mistake I did and order an additional one, thinking it is just the cup. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Christian counselor

customer_reviews.title: Ok only
customer_reviews.text: The tumbler does not keep my coffee hot quite as long as I assumed it would from the ads and reviews. Filling the tumbler with hot water before pouring coffee helps. My experience: very hot 1+ hour, drinkable hot about 2 hours, lukewarm the rest of the day. The performance is marginally better than the Starbucks tumbler. The open lid is an invitation for disaster. I also wonder how much the large drinking opening contributes to the heat loss. I do not use the tumbler for cold drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Hither 'n Yon

customer_reviews.title: Great cup
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Yeti. Heard they were good and reviews were right. I would suggest you make sure you know what cup holder size you need If your buying for the car. That was suggestion made to me before I bought mine. Didn’t think about that so was glad. Happy with the cup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Have used my new Yeti for both hot coffee and mocha freeze. The coffee stayed hot as long as I was drinking it and I was amazed to find the mocha freeze, which I had not finished, still had a large amount of ice in it the next day when I went to wash the cup. Lid fits nice and snug so no spillage when it tipped over accidentally.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Mason

customer_reviews.title: These are the best. They keep ice for half a day
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. They keep ice for half a day. They kept my hot cocoa VERY warm while we walked down Candy Cane Lane the other night. I like to get the silver one, because I’m clumsy and if you drop it, which I do often, it will take the color off if you have any other color. If you’re not clumsy, the colored ones look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: These tumblers are awesome. They keep ice all day and in Arizona ...
customer_reviews.text: These tumblers are awesome. They keep ice all day and in Arizona you need that. Disappointed that the army green ,OD Green tumbler cost ten dollars more then all other colors. Purchased for my vet son that lives for the OD Green color but felt like I was being overcharged because of that color. He is very happy with it so I am to
customer_reviews.author: AZTrucker

customer_reviews.title: lid leaks, doesn't keep temperature
customer_reviews.text: The drinking opening in the lid allows liquid to leak out. While carrying it around I discovered that it had spilled all over my blouse. Temperature does NOT stay constant. Hot gets cold and cold becomes warm. I'm wondering if this is indeed a real Yeti or a know-off.
customer_reviews.author: CAROLE LYNN SOKOLOFF

customer_reviews.title: yeti all the way!
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the 4 yeti mugs/cups that i own and use everyday. i use one for coffee, one for water and then my big water jug one as well. i love how long it keeps water cold even with the open lid on this one. Easy to clean and awesome quality.
customer_reviews.author: james mckee

customer_reviews.title: She doesn't like warm water and she loves this as it keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 91 year old Aunt who needs to drink lots of water. She doesn't like warm water and she loves this as it keeps her water cold for hours and hours. She said she is now drinking more water than she ever has.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Im not sure whats wrong
customer_reviews.text: Im kind of confused!! I have had my cup for a little over a week now. I love love loved it at first. Kept my coffee hot for hours..after an 8 hr work day it was still warm. Well after 3 days of usage now by the time i drive to work its luke warm. I am so upset. I only bought it because of all the hype. Has anyone else had this problem?? Please help.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen C.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I work for an off price outdoor retailer & we have these in the stores. They constantly sell out before I can get one. I decided to just bite the bullet and buy one on Amazon for my beach vacation. It works great. I was able to make myself a nice cocktail, bring it to the beach and not have it be warm within 20 mins. Stayed cold for hours in direct sunlight! Day to day I use it for my iced coffee at work. I'm not a big hot beverage drinker but it keeps cold so well I'm assuming it would be just as effective with heat!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Burr

customer_reviews.title: Cream of the crop.
customer_reviews.text: This YETI is positively the best mug I have used. Nice tight fitting lid and really does keep beverages either hot or cold. My coffee stays hot no matter how long it sits. Just last night, I filled it with ice water and fell asleep around 1:00 AM and when I woke up this morning at 8 AM, not only was the water still cold, it still had ice in it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous One

customer_reviews.title: She wasn't happy when that happened
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife after I accidentally broke her Starbuck's (ceramic) mug. She wasn't happy when that happened. But now she is very happy. The ceramic mug was nice, but didn't keep her coffee warm for long. This thing is incredible. Keeps it hot forever. Also, she doesn't detect any kind of metallic taste in her water or coffee. Lid is secure. Size is perfect. Fits nicely in the cupholder in the car. Solid. Quality workmanship. I can't break this one like I did the last one! My marriage is secure! :)
customer_reviews.author: Tesgin

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: $30 for a friggin' "go" cup?!? YEP! And worth every penny! I drove 150 miles starting at 4:30 AM. Parked the rig in 50 degree weather. Came back at 3:30 PM, jumped in the rig and my coffee was still warm??? (I think the secret is that they use Yeti fur for insulation which would also explain the price)
customer_reviews.author: Bruce G. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Lid Cracked and Defective - Not what expected for Yeti price
customer_reviews.text: I have a YETI coffee mug that I adore. I liked it so much, I ordered this second one. I have not used it more than 5 times and the lid has cracked. Always hand washed and never dropped. For this price - I am EXTREMELY disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: SusanS

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it and have no doubt it is the ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine is not a fake. All the labeling checks out and it weighs 13.93 oz (without lid)in my scale. I put ice water in it at 1pm. Added more water throughout the evening. At 10pm, there was still a little ice left. I'm happy with it and have no doubt it is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Willie F

customer_reviews.title: Great tumbler! Mediocre lid.
customer_reviews.text: The Tumbler is fantastic and lives up to all the hype, although the price is really just a little much. It would be nice to have an option for a lid that seals though. Or at least one that is insulated. Design-wise, the lid really is not on par with the cup itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Knox

customer_reviews.title: Great buy as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The only reasons why yeti doesn't get 5 stars is the lid is not a screw top so you can't put it in a cooler or bag and the lid has a vent and drink hole that cannot be sealed or closed as far as taking hunting hiking or fishing be very careful but as a travel mug, it's nice to still have ice 12 hours after you filled it
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't even sweat sitting on a table overnight.....awsome tumbler!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son in law. I was a bit skeptical about the ability to keep things cold. He put ice in it on Christmas eve, put it on the night stand, and went to bed. He checked it after noon and the ice was still there. I was shocked and so was everyone else. It is a quality product, although a little pricey. I understand why is it expensive, because you get what you pay for, and this tumbler is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cheaper versions are just as good, if not better
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Yeti product in March and three months later the vaccuum seal is gone. It doesn't keep drinks cold any longer than a regular glass and it also gets condensate on the outside now. Save you money and don't buy this product. The cheaper versions are just as good, if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Melder

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake and didn’t read the reviews. I cannot believe how crappy this cup is. My coffee didn’t stay warm at all. The first time I washed it it started cracking and changing color. Not worth it at all compared to another yeti cup I have this is trash!
customer_reviews.author: Tonia1234

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water cold for many hours and does not sweat
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much I am ordering the 30 oz. size. Keeps ice cold water very cold for a long time. I also use it for fruit juices. It keeps coffee or tea very hot for hours. I definitely recommend this product. I also ordered a handle. The 30 oz. size comes with a mag slider top I prefer the 30 oz. size because I drink a lot of water.
customer_reviews.author: Mandylynne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Yeti
customer_reviews.text: Husband has the 30 oz. so I got the 20 oz. cause I didnt wanna lug around this huge cup! It is sweatproof (which is handier than you might think!) and does a great job of keeping my drinks cold....if I fill it with crushed ice theres just not quite enough room for juice, then the ice kinda freezes together. I'm thinking I might have been happier with a 30 oz. (you know...a little slushie room) but the big one can get heavy when its full! I'll probably get used to it! A little less ice a little more juice. But YETI, come on now with a spillproof lid! Come on!
customer_reviews.author: C G

customer_reviews.title: The people who received these say they LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for gifts. Also, ordered the other tops and straws that go with this cup (if you want). The people who received these say they LOVE, LOVE, LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that great...
customer_reviews.text: Considering the raving reviews on this product I was hoping it would be great. It’s not. I think that for the price you can find something better. I had to buy a separate lid so I could actually travel with the mug and a few hours later my coffee is already cold. I ended up buying the official coffee lid with a cover and that was another disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Lolacc1979

product_meta.title: YETI Rambler Vacuum Insulated Tumbler with Lid
product_meta.description:
Rambler 30 oz. Tumbler

Days on the dock are made better with the Rambler 30 oz. Tumbler. It’ll keep your dinnertime drink cool well past sundown or your coffee nice and hot throughout the morning. The Rambler 30 oz. Tumbler is made of 18/8 kitchen-grade stainless steel, has double-wall vacuum insulation, and No Sweat Design. Which means that you’ve got one heavy-duty, over-engineered tumbler on your hands with the Rambler. It’s dishwasher safe, BPA-free, and ready for just about anything.

You can pick the YETI DuraCoat Color to fit your gear — Rambler Tumblers are available in Tahoe Blue, Seafoam, Olive Green, and Black.

The YETI 30 oz Rambler Tumbler stands 7 5/8 in high and has a lip diameter of 4 in. All YETI Tumblers are sized to fit in standard sized cup holders.
feature_bullets: With the YETI Rambler 20 oz. Tumbler, your beverages will stay ice cold or piping hot longer
We over-engineered these double-wall insulated tumblers with an 18/8 stainless steel body, which means your drink still keeps its temperature no matter how much of a beating this cup takes
They’re BPA-free (obviously), have a No Sweat Design to make sure your hands stay dry, and are dishwasher-safe
Its crystal-clear dishwasher safe shatter resistant lid lets you check your drink status in a flash. Refill, anyone?
The YETI 20 oz Rambler Tumbler stands 6 7/8 in high and has a lip diameter of 3 1/2 in. All YETI Tumblers are sized to fit in standard sized cup holders

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
